thread.title: FX's Alien: Earth Takes Center Stage at SXSW
thread.title_full: FX's Alien: Earth Takes Center Stage at SXSW

author: Sarah Carey
title: FX's Alien: Earth Takes Center Stage at SXSW
text:
FX’s highly anticipated series Alien: Earth is set to make a major impact at SXSW! The new series is kicking off with an immersive experience leading up to its Summer 2025 premiere.
From March 7-8, fans in Austin will have the chance to explore a mysterious wreckage site! There they can uncover exclusive details from the series, and take part in exciting photo ops and merchandise giveaways.
SXSW 2025: Alien: Earth by FX Upon entering, visitors will be greeted by interactive elements and heart-pounding thrills that bring the world of Alien: Earth to life. Fans will undergo an alien parasite scan before receiving credentials and instructions for their exploratory mission through the wreckage. They’ll get up close with alien specimens—but with a twist: not all of the creatures survived the crash intact. A containment breach has occurred, and hidden dangers lurk within.
FX’s Alien: Earth 360 marketing campaign will continue in the coming months. It will be featuring social video teasers, high-impact out-of-home displays, multi-market stunts, and two more immersive experiences. The Westin Downtown Austin, which overlooks the SXSW activation, will also be wrapped in FX’s Alien: Earth key art throughout the festival.
For more information on Alien: Earth , visit FX’s website . To stay ahead of the curve and get exclusive updates, sign up for FX Insider text alerts here .
ABOUT ALIEN: EARTH When a mysterious space vessel crash-lands on Earth, a young woman (Sydney Chandler) and a diverse group of tactical soldiers uncover a discovery that forces them to confront the planet’s greatest threat in FX’s highly anticipated new series Alien: Earth , created by Noah Hawley.
Set in the year 2120, Alien: Earth takes place in a world where five powerful corporations—Prodigy, Weyland-Yutani, Lynch, Dynamic, and Threshold—control the future. With their advancements in technology, they offer the promise of a brighter tomorrow, but at what cost?
The series, led by Chandler, features an expansive international cast, including Alex Lawther, Timothy Olyphant, Essie Davis, Samuel Blenkin, Babou Ceesay, David Rysdahl, Adrian Edmondson, Adarsh Gourav, Jonathan Ajayi, Erana James, Lily Newmark, Diem Camille, and Moe Bar-El.
Alien: Earth premieres Summer 2025 on FX . Watch it on Hulu .
